topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c4eab6368721875001473#post_559c4eab6368721875001473

Tell me about it.


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c4ed663687221d4001903#post_559c4ed663687221d4001903

There is a subsection of Tumblr quite literally made of _hundreds_ of blogs that glorify shoplifting and post their "hauls" online to the site. And these aren't people lifting to survive. They're usually white, middle class teenagers/young adults stealing expensive handbags and makeup.

topics.body:
"@And Brother I Hurt People":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559c506d636872615b000920#post_559c506d636872615b000920
Like, okay, this kids are fucking stupid yeah. But it's mostly the PARENTS who are at fault. If I ever even DARED to shoplift my mom would have beat my ass so hard that I wouldn't have been able to sit for a month. And I'll be the first to say that the "Spare the rod spoil the child" mentality is fucking retarded. But you still need to fucking discipline your kids when they act like little fucking savages.
